Description: Comparatively wide net-sinker made of light grey to beige steatite, roughly rectangular in section, parts of the surface as well as one end broken off, the other end is square in shape. The preserved and shows one circumferential groove incised and a second one parallel that is only visible on the upper side. The end that is broken off shows another groove just at the break. The surface is partly uneven and rough, partly even and smooth.
